name: I Just Wanna Grill!
description:
All Grill-Chan wanted was to cook, but one day the food began to fight back, and took all her customers away!
Help Grill-Chan save her customers, by searching through the land.

Keyboard Controls:
Direction Keys - Move
Z - Attack
Escape - Pause
Enter - Select

Controller Support: (PS-Classic Controller)
D-Pad - Move
X - Attack / Select
Start - Pause

Controller Support: (Generic)
Axis0/1 - Move
Button 2 - Attack/Select
Button 9 - Pause

This is a game for the LOWREZJAM 2020

Game Developed using Custom Game Engine using OpenGL Technologies
